name: Light Puzzle (Josant)
description:
OBJECTIVE:

Turn on all the lights (circles).

INSTRUCTIONS:

Click on the lights (circles) to change their status (on / off), the lights linked by a wire will change their status at the same time, only one wire color can be enabled at a time, you can change the wire with the SWITCH button.

CONTROLS:

Left Click : Lights On/Off

CREDITS:

- Graphics by Kenney 
- Music by Bert Cole www.bitbybitsound.com
